Majestic Word.name: Majestic Word
Majestic Word.flavor: You utter words laden with preternatural inspiration, restoring your ally’s stamina and making wounds seem insignificant.
Majestic Word.range: Close burst 5 (10 at 11th level, 15 at 21st level)
Majestic Word.target: You or one ally in the burst
Majestic Word.effect:
The target can spend a healing surge and regain additional hit points equal to your Charisma modifier. You also slide the target 1 square.
Level 6: 1d6 + Charisma modifier additional hit points.
Level 11: 2d6 + Charisma modifier additional hit points.
Level 16: 3d6 + Charisma modifier additional hit points.
Level 21: 4d6 + Charisma modifier additional hit points.
Level 26: 5d6 + Charisma modifier additional hit points.
Majestic Word.special: You can use this power twice per encounter, but only once per round. At 16th level, you can use this power three times per encounter, but only once per round.

Fast Friends.name: Fast Friends
Fast Friends.flavor: You sing a tune of false friendship, leaving your foe in a reverie.
Fast Friends.onHit: Choose yourself or an ally. The target cannot attack that character until the end of your next turn or until you or one of your allies attacks the target.

Blunder.name: Blunder
Blunder.flavor: You fog your foe’s mind, causing it to stumble past your allies.
Blunder.onHit: 1d6 + Charisma modifier damage, and you slide the target 2 squares. During the slide, you or one of your allies can make a melee basic attack against the target as a free action, with a +2 power bonus to the attack roll.
Blunder.virtueOfCunning: The power bonus to the attack roll equals 1 + your Intelligence modifier.

Inspiring Refrain.name: Inspiring Refrain
Inspiring Refrain.flavor: Your weapon hums with an arcane song that helps guide nearby allies to glory.
Inspiring Refrain.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and each ally within 5 squares of you gains a +1 power bonus to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Shout of Triumph.name: Shout of Triumph
Shout of Triumph.flavor: You unleash a mighty call of battle, scattering your enemies while urging your allies forward.
Shout of Triumph.onHit: 1d6 + Charisma modifier thunder damage, and you push the target 1 square.
Shout of Triumph.effect: You slide each ally in the blast 1 square.
Shout of Triumph.virtueOfValor: The number of squares you push the target and slide the allies equals your Constitution modifier.

Slayer's Song.name: Slayer's Song
Slayer's Song.flavor: You sing a tune of war that diminishes your foes’ defenses with each blow you strike.
Slayer's Song.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and the target grants combat advantage to you and your allies (save ends).
Slayer's Song.effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever you hit an enemy, that enemy grants combat advantage to you and your allies until the end of your next turn.

Echoes of the Guardian.name: Echoes of the Guardian
Echoes of the Guardian.flavor: You recite a verse from the saga of a great warrior, confounding your enemy so that one of your companions can more easily protect the others.
Echoes of the Guardian.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and until the end of your next turn, the target is marked by an ally within 5 squares of you.
Echoes of the Guardian.effect: Until the end of the encounter, once during each of your turns, choose an ally within 5 squares of you when you hit an enemy. Until the end of your next turn, that enemy is marked by that ally.

Song of Defense.name: Song of Defense
Song of Defense.flavor: You intone a few notes from a battle hymn, and your magic bolsters your allies’ ability to parry attacks.
Song of Defense.effect: The burst creates a zone of bolstering song that lasts until the end of your next turn. When you move, the zone moves with you, remaining centered on you. While within the zone, any ally gains a +1 power bonus to AC.

Song of Courage.name: Song of Courage
Song of Courage.flavor: Your magic creates shouts of encouragement, making it seem as though an entire army were cheering on your allies.
Song of Courage.effect: The burst creates a zone of inspirational shouts that lasts until the end of your next turn. When you move, the zone moves with you, remaining centered on you. While within the zone, any ally gains a +1 power bonus to attack rolls.

Hunter's Tune.name: Hunter's Tune
Hunter's Tune.flavor: You shape the flow of sound, containing it and creating an area of silence.
Hunter's Tune.effect: Until the end of your next turn, the target gains a +5 power bonus to Stealth checks and doesn’t take a penalty to Stealth checks for moving more than 2 squares or running.
Hunter's Tune.sustainMinor: The effect persists if the target is within range.

Trickster's Healing.name: Trickster's Healing
Trickster's Healing.flavor: Your magic turns an enemy’s blunder into an opportunity for your allies to overcome their wounds.
Trickster's Healing.trigger: An attack misses an ally within 10 squares of you
Trickster's Healing.target: Each ally in the burst missed by the triggering attack
Trickster's Healing.effect: Each target regains hit points equal to one-half your level + your Intelligence modifier.

Misdirected Mark.name: Misdirected Mark
Misdirected Mark.flavor: You conceal your arcane attack, tricking your foe into thinking the attack came from one of your allies.
Misdirected Mark.onHit:
1d8 + Charisma modifier damage, and the target is marked by an ally within 5 squares of you until the end of your next turn.
Level 21: 2d8 + Charisma modifier damage.

Deflect Attention.name: Deflect Attention
Deflect Attention.flavor: You focus a foe’s violent determination elsewhere, making you or an ally invisible to it for a moment.
Deflect Attention.onHit: 2d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and you or an ally within 10 squares of you becomes invisible to the target until the end of your next turn.

Satire of Bravery.name: Satire of Bravery
Satire of Bravery.flavor: Your verse mocks your foes’ courage, forcing them to become the cowards you describe.
Satire of Bravery.onHit: 2d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target is affected by your satire of bravery (save ends). While the target is affected by the satire, if the target ends its turn closer to you than where it started its turn, the target takes 1d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage and is dazed until the end of its next turn.

Allegro.name: Allegro
Allegro.flavor: You drum out a hasty rhythm that infuses you and your comrades with magical speed.
Allegro.target: You and each ally in the burst

Song of Conquest.name: Song of Conquest
Song of Conquest.flavor: Your arcane song bolsters your allies, so they fight your foes with renewed vigor.
Song of Conquest.effect: Until the end of your next turn, any ally within 5 squares of you who hits an enemy gains temporary hit points equal to 3 + your Constitution modifier.

Ode to Sacrifice.name: Ode to Sacrifice
Ode to Sacrifice.flavor: Like many heroes who prove their worth by shouldering the burdens of others, you take a harmful effect from an ally.
Ode to Sacrifice.effect: You transfer one effect on the target that a save can end to yourself or to another ally in the burst. The new subject of the effect gains a power bonus to saving throws against that effect equal to your Constitution modifier.

Unluck.name: Unluck
Unluck.flavor: You manipulate what was once an ode to fate, speaking it in reverse and warping the weave of fortune.
Unluck.onHit: 1d8 + Charisma modifier necrotic damage. The next time the target makes an attack roll before the end of your next turn, you roll 1d20 and can replace the target’s roll with yours. In addition, choose an ally within 5 squares of you. The next time that ally attacks the target before the end of your next turn, you roll 1d20 and can replace the ally’s roll with yours.

Idyll of Calm.name: Idyll of Calm
Idyll of Calm.flavor: You hum a soft song that cools your allies’ tempers and helps them focus.
Idyll of Calm.effect: The burst creates a zone of calm that lasts until the end of the encounter. When you move, the zone moves with you, remaining centered on you. Each ally within the zone gains a +2 power bonus to Will, and any penalty to attack rolls that such an ally takes is lessened by 2.

Veil.name: Veil
Veil.flavor: You mask the appearance of your party, sculpting an illusory disguise.
Veil.target: You and each ally in the burst
Veil.effect: You transform the auditory, tactile, and visual qualities of the targets’ bodies and equipment. Each target assumes the appearance of a humanoid of the same size, even the appearance of a specific individual you have seen. The illusion lasts for 1 hour, or you can end it as a minor action. A creature can recognize a target’s form as illusory with an Insight check opposed by that target’s Bluff check with a +5 power bonus.

Illusory Erasure.name: Illusory Erasure
Illusory Erasure.flavor: Your magic song makes an ally abruptly disappear, giving him or her a chance to sneak up on foes.
Illusory Erasure.effect: The target becomes invisible until the end of your next turn, and you slide the target 2 squares.

Song of Recovery.name: Song of Recovery
Song of Recovery.flavor: You instill a sense of perseverance in your allies with an inspiring song.
Song of Recovery.effect: Until the end of your next turn, any ally within 5 squares of you gains a +2 power bonus to saving throws.

Foolhardy Fighting.name: Foolhardy Fighting
Foolhardy Fighting.flavor: Your attack inspires recklessness in your foe, causing it to act without caution.
Foolhardy Fighting.onHit: 1d10 + Charisma modifier psychic damage. Until the end of your next turn, any attack the target makes provokes opportunity attacks.
Foolhardy Fighting.virtueOfCunning: Until the end of your next turn, the target takes a penalty to attack rolls equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Song of Storms.name: Song of Storms
Song of Storms.flavor: With a sonorous hum, you summon lightning, blasting your foes with it and imbuing your allies’ attacks with its power.
Song of Storms.onHit: 2d6 + Charisma modifier lightning damage. Effect: If the attack hits at least once, each ally in the blast deals 1d6 extra lightning damage whenever he or she hits before the end of your next turn.

Confusing Chorus.name: Confusing Chorus
Confusing Chorus.flavor: Hundreds of voices jeer and threaten your foe from all sides. Lashing out blindly, the foe might hit anyone.
Confusing Chorus.onHit: 3d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage. As the first action of each of the target’s turns, the target makes a melee basic attack against a creature of your choice as a free action (save ends).
Confusing Chorus.onMiss: Half damage. As the first action of the target’s next turn, the target makes a melee basic attack against a creature of your choice as a free action.

Rhythm of Disorientation.name: Rhythm of Disorientation
Rhythm of Disorientation.flavor: A clatter of sounds surrounds your foes, causing them to lose their balance and creating opportunities for your allies to attack.
Rhythm of Disorientation.onHit: 1d6 + Charisma modifier thunder damage, and you knock the target prone. In addition, an ally of yours adjacent to the target can make a melee basic attack against it as a free action.

Blink Zone.name: Blink Zone
Blink Zone.flavor: You warp the boundaries between worlds, causing the boundaries to fade and mingle.
Blink Zone.effect: The burst creates a zone of planar instability that lasts until the end of your next turn. While within the zone, you and any ally gain a +2 power bonus to AC and Reflex and can teleport 2 squares as a move action.

Chorus of Recovery.name: Chorus of Recovery
Chorus of Recovery.flavor: You whisper a quiet song of peace and health, fortifying your allies against the ills that plague them.
Chorus of Recovery.effect: The burst creates a zone of rejuvenation that lasts until the end of your next turn. When you move, the zone moves with you, remaining centered on you. Any ally who starts his or her turn within the zone can make a saving throw.

Song of Sublime Snowfall.name: Song of Sublime Snowfall
Song of Sublime Snowfall.flavor: Your song causes gleaming white motes to fall from above, healing your allies and pulling at your foes as they try to move in the area.
Song of Sublime Snowfall.effect: Each target regains hit points equal to your Charisma modifier. The burst creates a zone of difficult terrain for enemies that lasts until the end of your next turn. This difficult terrain also affects flying enemies.
Song of Sublime Snowfall.sustainMinor: The zone persists, and each target within the zone regains hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.

Masks of Menace.name: Masks of Menace
Masks of Menace.flavor: You warp your enemy’s perception so that it perceives your allies as frightful beasts. Only one ally retains a normal appearance.
Masks of Menace.onHit: 3d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage. Choose an ally within 5 squares of you. Until the end of your next turn, the target takes a -5 penalty to attack rolls for any attack that doesn’t include that ally as a target.

Weal and Woe.name: Weal and Woe
Weal and Woe.flavor: Your attack brings doom to your foe and glory to your ally.
Weal and Woe.onHit: 3[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and one ally adjacent to the target makes a saving throw with a +5 power bonus.
Weal and Woe.virtueOfValor: The ally gains a power bonus to his or her next attack roll against the target equal to your Constitution modifier.

Spellbind.name: Spellbind
Spellbind.flavor: Your unrivaled charm, combined with cunning magic, convinces an enemy to obey you.

Vision Distortion.name: Vision Distortion
Vision Distortion.flavor: A burst of blinding light skews the vision of your enemies.
Vision Distortion.onHit: 3d8 + Charisma modifier radiant damage. The target’s vision is distorted (save ends). While the target’s vision is distorted, you are invisible to the target, and whenever an ally hits it, that ally becomes invisible to the target until the end of the ally’s next turn.
Vision Distortion.onMiss: Half damage, and you are invisible to the target until the end of your next turn.

Satire of Prowess.name: Satire of Prowess
Satire of Prowess.flavor: Your verse mocks your foe’s attacks and forces it to conform to your description of its ineptitude.
Satire of Prowess.onHit: 4d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target is affected by your satire of prowess (save ends). While the target is affected by the satire, the target rolls twice when it makes an attack roll and must use the lower roll, and any attacker rolls twice when it makes an attack roll against the target and must use the higher roll.
Satire of Prowess.onMiss: Half damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target rolls twice when it makes an attack roll and must use the lower roll, and any attacker rolls twice when it makes an attack roll against the target and must use the higher roll.

Invisible Troupe.name: Invisible Troupe
Invisible Troupe.flavor: As you whisper a word, you and your allies fade from view.
Invisible Troupe.target: You and each ally in the burst
Invisible Troupe.effect: Each target becomes invisible until the end of your next turn.

Mirrored Entourage.name: Mirrored Entourage
Mirrored Entourage.flavor: You weave a song of illusion, causing duplicates to appear next to your allies. The duplicates try to intercept enemy attacks and disappear when they succeed.
Mirrored Entourage.effect: Each target gains two illusory duplicates of him- or herself that last until the end of the encounter. Until the duplicates disappear, the duplicates share the target’s space and move with him or her. In addition, the target gains a +4 power bonus to AC. When an attack against AC misses the target, one of that target’s duplicates disappears, and the power bonus to AC decreases by 2.

Song of Transition.name: Song of Transition
Song of Transition.flavor: Your song swells and bends planar boundaries, allowing allies to make jaunts through space.
Song of Transition.effect: You create a zone of music that lasts until the end of your next turn. While within the zone, you and any ally can teleport to any space within 10 squares of you as a move action.

Adversarial Song.name: Adversarial Song
Adversarial Song.flavor: Your song erupts in your foe’s mind, weakening its attacks against any creature but the ally you name. At the same time, it bolsters that ally so that he or she can fight the foe to the bitter end.
Adversarial Song.effect: Choose an ally within 10 squares of you. The target deals half damage to any of your allies except the chosen ally (save ends). In addition, that ally deals 1d10 extra damage on a hit against the target until the end of the encounter.

Satire of Leadership.name: Satire of Leadership
Satire of Leadership.flavor: Your verse mocks your foe’s leadership and bends reality to conform with your words; any enemy near your foe is more vulnerable to attack.
Satire of Leadership.effect: The target and each enemy within 3 squares of it take a -2 penalty to all defenses and gain vulnerable 5 to all damage (save ends both).

Fraught with Failure.name: Fraught with Failure
Fraught with Failure.flavor: Your mocking song saps your foe’s will and breaks its confidence, leaving it immobile and ineffectual.
Fraught with Failure.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends) and weakened (save ends).
Fraught with Failure.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is immobilized and weakened until the end of your next turn.

Vicious Mockery.name: Vicious Mockery
Vicious Mockery.flavor: You unleash a string of insults at your foe, weaving them with bardic magic to send the creature into a blind rage.
Vicious Mockery.onHit:
1d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
Level 21: 2d6 + Charisma modifier damage.

Increasing the Tempo.name: Increasing the Tempo
Increasing the Tempo.flavor: Your ally attacks with incredible speed, becoming a blur of motion.
Increasing the Tempo.effect: The target makes four basic attacks as a free action. No more than two of the attacks can be against a single target.

Verse of Triumph.name: Verse of Triumph
Verse of Triumph.flavor: Your voice crescendos as you sing of victory. Your inspirational words drive allies forward to attack.
Verse of Triumph.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you and any ally within 5 squares of you gain a +1 power bonus to damage rolls and saving throws. In addition, whenever you or an ally reduces an enemy to 0 hit points with an attack, you and any ally within 5 squares of the enemy can shift 1 square as a free action.

Charger's Call.name: Charger's Call
Charger's Call.flavor: You weave a song of fearless knights and mighty chargers, encouraging your allies to throw themselves into the fray.
Charger's Call.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and each ally within 5 squares of you gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls while charging until the end of your next turn.
Charger's Call.virtueOfValor: The bonus to attack rolls equals 1 + your Constitution modifier.

Break Enchantment.name: Break Enchantment
Break Enchantment.flavor: Your arcane poem frees your allies’ minds.
Break Enchantment.effect: The target rolls a saving throw. If the saving throw is against a charm, a fear, or an illusion effect, the target gains a bonus to the saving throw equal to your Charisma modifier.

Illuminating Stars.name: Illuminating Stars
Illuminating Stars.flavor: You invoke the light of the full moon and the guiding star of the north, revealing hidden foes to your allies.
Illuminating Stars.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you and any allies within 5 squares of you gain a +5 power bonus to Insight checks and Perception checks.

Jinx Shot.name: Jinx Shot
Jinx Shot.flavor: Your expert shot renders your foe unaccountably clumsy.
Jinx Shot.onHit:
1[W] + Charisma modifier damage. The first time the target misses with an attack before the end of your next turn, it falls prone.
Level 21: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage.

Words of Friendship.name: Words of Friendship
Words of Friendship.sourceRef: Player's Handbook 2, Heroes of the Feywild
Words of Friendship.flavor: You infuse your words with arcane power, turning even the simplest speech into a compelling oration.
Words of Friendship.effect: You gain a +5 power bonus to the next Diplomacy check you make before the end of your next turn.

Prophesied Strike.name: Prophesied Strike
Prophesied Strike.flavor: You cast your mind’s eye forward a split second, predicting the best moment for a telling blow.
Prophesied Strike.onHit: 1[W] + Charisma modifier damage. The next time you or an ally attacks the target before the end of your next turn, the attacker rolls a d20 twice and uses either result.

Prophetic Action.name: Prophetic Action
Prophetic Action.flavor: You study your enemy and deduce its next move, letting an ally dodge its attack.
Prophetic Action.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage. Until the end of your next turn, the first time the target misses you or an ally with an attack, one target (your choice) of that attack can shift a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum 1) as an immediate reaction.

Mind Game.name: Mind Game
Mind Game.flavor: You utter a string of distracting and disparaging remarks, turning your enemy’s attention toward you rather than toward your ally.
Mind Game.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage. Until the end of your next turn, each ally who makes an attack roll against the target can choose to target its Will instead of the defense normally targeted by the ally’s attack.

Theft of Life.name: Theft of Life
Theft of Life.flavor: As you shout a word of power, health and vitality drain from your foe and refresh a nearby ally.
Theft of Life.effect: An ally adjacent to the target can spend a healing surge and also gains temporary hit points equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Insightful Shot.name: Insightful Shot
Insightful Shot.flavor: As your arrow streaks forth, it guides the way to your foe’s most vulnerable spot.
Insightful Shot.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage. All the target’s defenses are equal to its lowest defense until the next time it is hit by an attack.
Insightful Shot.virtueOfPrescience: The next attack that hits the target gains a bonus to the damage roll equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Rewrite the Future.name: Rewrite the Future
Rewrite the Future.flavor: With a wave of the hand, this shot’s arcane energy can change an enemy’s future.
Rewrite the Future.onHit: 1[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and you roll a d20. Until the end of your next turn, you can replace an ally’s attack roll against the target with your d20 roll or replace the target’s attack roll with your d20 roll as a free action.

Enduring Struggle.name: Enduring Struggle
Enduring Struggle.flavor: You shout a verse of triumph as you fire, urging your allies to fight to the end.
Enduring Struggle.onHit: 3[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and each ally within 3 squares of the target regains hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.

Strings of Fate.name: Strings of Fate
Strings of Fate.flavor: As you make an appeal to the fates of battle, your arrows streak toward your enemies, bypassing their armor to bind their doom.
Strings of Fate.onHit: 1[W] + Charisma modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, attacks against the target’s AC instead target its Reflex.

Balance of Fortune.name: Balance of Fortune
Balance of Fortune.flavor: You disrupt fortune’s weave, shifting it to give your allies a little more luck at the expense of one of your foes.
Balance of Fortune.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, whenever the target makes an attack roll, you roll a d4 and subtract your roll from the target’s attack roll. Until the end of your next turn, whenever an ally makes an attack roll against the target, you roll a d4 and add your roll to your ally’s attack roll.
Balance of Fortune.virtueOfPrescience: You roll a d6 instead of a d4 when modifying attack rolls.

Sound Strike.name: Sound Strike
Sound Strike.flavor: You loose a shot as you inveigh against your foe, confounding its defenses so that an ally’s strike is sure to score a deadly wound.
Sound Strike.onHit: 3[W] + Charisma modifier thunder damage. The next attack roll made against the target before the end of your next turn targets all of its defenses. For each defense the attack hits beyond the first, the attack deals 1d10 extra damage.

Arrow of Warning.name: Arrow of Warning
Arrow of Warning.flavor: Your shot hinders an enemy and gives its would-be target the perfect opportunity.
Arrow of Warning.trigger: An enemy within range makes an attack roll against an ally
Arrow of Warning.onHit: 3[W] + Charisma modifier damage. The ally who was attacked by the triggering enemy can make an at-will attack against that enemy as a free action. The ally gains a bonus to this attack roll equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum 1).

Satire of Fortune.name: Satire of Fortune
Satire of Fortune.flavor: You mock your foe’s luck, using your verse to make your insults come painfully true.
Satire of Fortune.effect: The next time an ally misses the target with an attack during this encounter, you roll a d20 and replace the ally’s attack roll with yours.

Strictures of Fortune.name: Strictures of Fortune
Strictures of Fortune.flavor: Your song of fortune assists your allies and impedes your enemies.
Strictures of Fortune.effect: The next time the target would recharge a power before the end of the encounter, the power instead does not recharge, and you or an ally within 10 squares of you regains the use of an encounter power.

Wail of Anguish.name: Wail of Anguish
Wail of Anguish.flavor: A threnody of loss and sorrow saps your foes’ ability to escape harm.

bonusPower.name: Wail of Anguish Attack
bonusPower.flavor: A threnody of loss and sorrow saps your foes’ ability to escape harm.
bonusPower.requirement: The Wail of Anguish power must be active to use this power.
bonusPower.trigger: An enemy starts its turn within 3 squares of you
bonusPower.target: The triggering enemy in the burst
bonusPower.onHit: Charisma modifier damage, and the target cannot shift until the end of your next turn.

Wail of Anguish.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you can use the Wail of Anguish Attack power.

Symphony of Misfortune.name: Symphony of Misfortune
Symphony of Misfortune.flavor: You unleash a song of missed chances, lost hope, and tragic accidents, bringing bad luck to your enemies.
Symphony of Misfortune.effect:
The burst creates a zone of misfortune that lasts until the end of your next turn. Choose one of the following misfortune effects; until the end of your next turn, each enemy that starts its turn within the zone is subject to that effect.
• The enemy is slowed.
• The enemy takes psychic damage equal to your Charisma modifier.
• The enemy grants combat advantage to your allies.
Symphony of Misfortune.sustainMinor: The zone persists. You can choose a new misfortune effect for the zone when you sustain this power.

Wracking Radiance.name: Wracking Radiance
Wracking Radiance.flavor: A burst of light damages your foe and wracks it with anguish. As your enemy’s suffering continues, bursts of light heal your nearby allies.
Wracking Radiance.effect: The target takes ongoing 5 radiant damage (save ends). Whenever the target fails a saving throw against this effect, each ally within 5 squares of the target regains 5 hit points.
Wracking Radiance.aftereffect: Each ally within 5 squares of the target regains 5 hit points and also gains a +2 power bonus to AC until the end of the target’s next turn.

Linked Fortunes.name: Linked Fortunes
Linked Fortunes.flavor: Your magic grants your friends superior luck, but the wheel of fate gives luck to your enemies in equal measure.
Linked Fortunes.effect: The target is affected by linked fortunes (save ends). While it is affected by linked fortunes, as an immediate interrupt, when the target is missed by an ally’s attack, you can roll a d20 and replace the ally’s attack roll with yours. Whenever you do so, the target can roll a d20 once during its next turn and replace its attack roll with that roll.

Spring to Action.name: Spring to Action
Spring to Action.flavor: Intoning a melody of the planes, you thin the boundaries between realities so that your allies travel far in one step.
Spring to Action.effect: The burst creates a zone of warped space that lasts until the end of your next turn. While the zone persists, you and any allies within 20 squares of you can use a move action to teleport to an unoccupied space within the zone.

Sculpt Fate.name: Sculpt Fate
Sculpt Fate.flavor: Your song no longer describes your enemy’s fate—it creates it.
Sculpt Fate.effect: Roll a number of d20s equal to the number of targets you hit with this attack. Until the end of the encounter, as a free action you can force an enemy within 20 squares of you to replace an attack roll or a saving throw with one of your rolls. You can use each roll only once.

Leave It Dead.name: Leave It Dead
Leave It Dead.flavor: With a single shot of your weapon, you intensify your allies’ attack against your adversary.
Leave It Dead.onHit: 3[W] + Charisma modifier damage. Until the end of the encounter, whenever you or an ally rolls the maximum result on any damage die against the target, reroll the die and add that result as extra damage to the total damage dealt.
Leave It Dead.onMiss: Half damage. Until the end of your next turn, whenever you or an ally rolls the maximum result on any damage die against the target, reroll the die and add that result as extra damage to the total damage dealt.

Arrow of Destiny.name: Arrow of Destiny
Arrow of Destiny.flavor: What this arrow pierces soon falls.
Arrow of Destiny.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and the target is affected by your arrow of destiny (save ends). While the target is affected by the arrow of destiny, whenever the target is hit by an attack from an ally, you can use an immediate interrupt to make the attack a critical hit.
Arrow of Destiny.onMiss: Half damage. If the target is hit by an attack from an ally before the end of your next turn, you can use an immediate interrupt to make the attack a critical hit.

Words of Protective Fate.name: Words of Protective Fate
Words of Protective Fate.flavor: Your voice shields your allies against misfortune, turning otherwise deadly blows into less damaging strikes.
Words of Protective Fate.target: You and each ally in the burst
Words of Protective Fate.effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever a critical hit is scored on the target, you roll a d20. If you roll a 10 or higher, the attack hits but is not a critical hit.

Concerted Effort.name: Concerted Effort
Concerted Effort.flavor: Your magic hums around your allies, growing in power as they redouble their efforts toward the task at hand.
Concerted Effort.target: You and each ally in the burst
Concerted Effort.effect: Until the end of your next turn, each target gains a +1 power bonus to attack rolls. Whenever a target hits with at least one attack during his or her turn, the bonus increases by 1 for each target whose turn has not yet started.

Glimpse the Future.name: Glimpse the Future
Glimpse the Future.flavor: Just as you uphold the examples of the past, so too do you draw on the future to inspire your companions.
Glimpse the Future.effect: Roll a d20 three times and keep the highest roll. Once before the end of the encounter, you can use this roll to replace a d20 roll of an ally within 10 squares of you.

Savior's Song.name: Savior's Song
Savior's Song.flavor: You inspire determination and focus in your allies with hopeful verses of battles won despite daunting odds.
Savior's Song.effect: Until the end of the encounter, each ally who ends his or her turn within 5 squares of you can reroll one saving throw that he or she fails during that turn.

Allied Rhythm.name: Allied Rhythm
Allied Rhythm.flavor: The greatest heroes always had a little help from their friends.
Allied Rhythm.effect: Until the end of your next turn, the target gains a power bonus to each of his or her attack rolls equal to the number of allies adjacent to the target of each of those attacks.

Firemetal Shot.name: Firemetal Shot
Firemetal Shot.flavor: You bury a bolt deep in your opponent’s flesh. The bolt begins to glow red-hot.
Firemetal Shot.onHit: 1[W] + Charisma modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, whenever an ally hits the target, the target takes extra fire damage equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Entangling Opening.name: Entangling Opening
Entangling Opening.flavor: A well-placed shot creates an opening for a follow-up attack that knocks your foe prone.
Entangling Opening.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier psychic damage. The next time the target is hit by an attack before the end of your next turn, it is knocked prone.

Song of Duplicitous Allure.name: Song of Duplicitous Allure
Song of Duplicitous Allure.flavor: The soft tones of your voice draw your foe closer.
Song of Duplicitous Allure.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and you pull the target 2 squares. Until the end of your next turn, each time the target is hit by a ranged attack, you pull it 1 square.

Chillsong Stroke.name: Chillsong Stroke
Chillsong Stroke.flavor: Your rhythm of winter draws vigor from your foe and infuses it into your ally, who leaps forward.
Chillsong Stroke.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier cold damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn. An ally within 3 squares of you can shift 4 squares as a free action.

Timely Distraction.name: Timely Distraction
Timely Distraction.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

Couplet of Deceptive Weakness.name: Couplet of Deceptive Weakness
Couplet of Deceptive Weakness.flavor: You draw on a legendary stratagem, feigning vulnerability to lure your foe into a trap.
Couplet of Deceptive Weakness.trigger: An enemy moves into a square adjacent to you
Couplet of Deceptive Weakness.onHit: 1[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and an ally within 5 squares of you can shift 5 squares as a free action. That ally must end this movement adjacent to the target and then can make a melee basic attack against the target as a free action.

Insult of Passivity.name: Insult of Passivity
Insult of Passivity.flavor: Under a barrage of jeers, your foe is rendered hesitant and fearful.
Insult of Passivity.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target is dazed until the end of the encounter or until it is hit or missed by an attack.

Slippery Feet.name: Slippery Feet
Slippery Feet.flavor: You recite an ode to the winter wind, coating your foe’s steps in ice.
Slippery Feet.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier cold damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn. Whenever the target is hit by an attack while it is slowed by this power, you slide the target 1 square.

Chant of Bad Fortune.name: Chant of Bad Fortune
Chant of Bad Fortune.flavor: Your song unravels the skein of fate, dooming your foes.
Chant of Bad Fortune.onHit: 3d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target takes a -5 penalty to saving throws until the end of your next turn.
Chant of Bad Fortune.effect: Each ally in the burst can roll a saving throw.

Binding Rhyme.name: Binding Rhyme
Binding Rhyme.flavor: You loose an arrow and chant a verse of imprisonment, binding your enemies with arcane strands.
Binding Rhyme.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier force damage, and you slide the target 5 squares to a space that must be adjacent to one of its allies. Until the end of its next turn, the target is immobilized, and each enemy that starts its turn adjacent to the target takes 20 force damage at the end of its turn if that enemy is not adjacent to the target at that time.

Malevolent Mischief.name: Malevolent Mischief
Malevolent Mischief.flavor: You plague your foe with a spell of ill luck, causing knots to unravel and straps to part so that it stumbles like an oaf.
Malevolent Mischief.effect: The target is affected by ill luck (save ends). While affected by ill luck, the target is slowed until the end of its next turn whenever you or an ally hits it with an attack.

Compulsion.name: Compulsion
Compulsion.flavor: You croon a beguiling melody, inducing your foe to wander wherever you direct it.
Compulsion.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and you slide the target 5 squares either at the start of its turn or at the end of its turn (save ends). Until it saves, the target cannot take move actions on its turn.
Compulsion.onMiss: Half damage. You slide the target 5 squares either at the start of its turn or at the end of its next turn, and it cannot take move actions on its next turn.

Turning the Tide.name: Turning the Tide
Turning the Tide.flavor: You call upon the legends of great heroes’ perseverance to inspire your allies in their hour of need.
Turning the Tide.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, each ally who hits the target can spend a healing surge. An ally can spend only one healing surge in this way.

Intimidating Visage.name: Intimidating Visage
Intimidating Visage.flavor: In your enemies’ eyes, you and your allies become awe-inspiring figures. Your foes are so impressed by you that they choose to remain next to you.
Intimidating Visage.target: Each enemy in the burst that is adjacent to you or an ally
Intimidating Visage.onHit: 1d10 + Charisma modifier psychic damage. The target takes 10 psychic damage at the end of its turn if it is not adjacent to you or an ally within 10 squares of you.
Intimidating Visage.onMiss: Half damage, and you slide the target 1 square.

Wall of Sound.name: Wall of Sound
Wall of Sound.flavor: A shimmering, pounding wall of thunder rumbles into existence.
Wall of Sound.effect: You conjure a wall of contiguous squares filled with deafening thunder that lasts until the end of your next turn. The wall can be up to 4 squares high. A creature that starts its turn adjacent to the wall takes 1d6 + your Charisma modifier thunder damage. If a creature moves into the wall’s space or starts its turn there, the creature takes 1d10 + your Charisma modifier thunder damage, and it is deafened until the end of the encounter. A creature can take this damage only once per turn. Each enemy that is hit by an attack while it is adjacent to the wall or in the wall’s space is dazed until the end of its next turn. Entering a square occupied by the wall costs 1 extra square of movement.

Iceshard Shot.name: Iceshard Shot
Iceshard Shot.flavor: You chant a verse of the northern ice as you draw your bow, and hoarfrost glitters on the arrowhead as it leaps to its target.
Iceshard Shot.effect: The target takes ongoing 10 cold damage (save ends). If you or an ally hits the target with an attack, it automatically fails its next saving throw against this effect.

Horrifying Truth.name: Horrifying Truth
Horrifying Truth.flavor: Your cruel pronouncement becomes truer with every strike.
Horrifying Truth.onHit: 4d8 + Charisma modifier damage. If the target is hit by an attack while it is dazed by this power, it becomes stunned instead (save ends).

Shockwave Strike.name: Shockwave Strike
Shockwave Strike.flavor: Rolling bursts of thunder smash your opponents and continue to echo among them.
Shockwave Strike.effect: The target takes a -2 penalty to AC until the end of your next turn.
Shockwave Strike.sustainMinor: Each enemy within 5 squares of you takes thunder damage equal to your Constitution modifier and takes a -2 penalty to AC until the end of your next turn.

Canon of Avoidance.name: Canon of Avoidance
Canon of Avoidance.flavor: Your song of protection trips from ally to ally, cloaking each one in a magical shield.
Canon of Avoidance.effect: The target gains a +2 power bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn.
Canon of Avoidance.sustainMinor: The effect persists. When you sustain the effect, you can transfer it to another ally within 10 squares of you.

Clockwork Precision.name: Clockwork Precision
Clockwork Precision.flavor: You hum a simple tune of unity, allowing you and your allies to better work together.
Clockwork Precision.target: You and each ally in the burst
Clockwork Precision.effect: Until the end of the encounter, each target gains a +2 bonus to skill checks made to aid another. When a target aids attack, aids defense, or successfully aids another, he or she grants a +3 bonus instead of a +2 bonus to the roll.

Synchronicity.name: Synchronicity
Synchronicity.flavor: A single chord is all it takes to spur your allies forward.
Synchronicity.target: You and each ally in the burst
Synchronicity.effect: Each target gains a +5 bonus to initiative during this encounter.

Heroic Interjection.name: Heroic Interjection
Heroic Interjection.flavor: As your enemy presses the attack, you call upon the innate heroism of your companions to respond in kind.
Heroic Interjection.trigger: An enemy within 10 squares of you spends an action point
Heroic Interjection.effect: The target gains an action point that he or she must spend before the end of the encounter. In addition, the target can spend 2 action points during this encounter instead of 1.

Ode to the Daring.name: Ode to the Daring
Ode to the Daring.flavor: Your song of praise inspires your allies to cast aside their injuries and pains and fight on.
Ode to the Daring.target: You and each ally in the burst
Ode to the Daring.effect: Each target regains hit points as if he or she had spent a healing surge. Add 1d10 + your Charisma modifier to the hit points regained by each target. Each target can also roll a saving throw.

Elegy Unwritten.name: Elegy Unwritten
Elegy Unwritten.flavor: Your quick word staves off death before it can grasp your friend.
Elegy Unwritten.trigger: An ally within 5 squares of you dies
Elegy Unwritten.target: The triggering ally in the burst
Elegy Unwritten.effect: The target regains hit points as if he or she had spent a healing surge. In addition, the target can stand up and shift 2 squares as a free action.

Elegy of the Undefeated.name: Elegy of the Undefeated
Elegy of the Undefeated.flavor: This ancient lament returns an ally from the brink of death.
Elegy of the Undefeated.target: One dying ally in the burst
Elegy of the Undefeated.effect: The target regains hit points as if he or she had spent two healing surges. The target can then stand up as a free action.

Hymn of the Daring Rescue.name: Hymn of the Daring Rescue
Hymn of the Daring Rescue.flavor: Your attack resonates in an arcane song that allows an ally to teleport to your side.
Hymn of the Daring Rescue.effect: Choose an ally within 5 squares of you. Until the end of the encounter, that ally can teleport to a space adjacent to you as a move action.

Virtuoso of Misfortune.name: Virtuoso of Misfortune
Virtuoso of Misfortune.flavor: You manipulate luck like a master musician, turning good fortune to bad and victory to doom.
Virtuoso of Misfortune.onHit: 3d6 + Charisma modifier damage, and the target takes a -5 penalty to saving throws (save ends). Until the end of the encounter, whenever the target fails a saving throw, an ally within 5 squares of the target can roll a saving throw.
Virtuoso of Misfortune.onMiss: Half damage, and the target takes a -5 penalty to saving throws until the end of your next turn.

Haste.name: Haste
Haste.flavor: You briefly gesture, and your companion suddenly acts in a blur of motion.
Haste.effect: The target gains and immediately uses a standard action.

Guiding Strike.name: Guiding Strike
Guiding Strike.flavor: Your weapon stroke guides your allies, showing them where to focus their attacks.
Guiding Strike.onHit:
1[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to the defense of your choice until the end of your next turn.
Level 21: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage.

War Song Strike.name: War Song Strike
War Song Strike.flavor: You sing a song of war and victory, invigorating your allies as they press the attack.
War Song Strike.onHit:
1[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and any ally who hits the target before the end of your next turn gains temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier.
Level 21: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage.

Stirring Shout.name: Stirring Shout
Stirring Shout.flavor: Your shout of wrath stabs into your foe’s mind. Each time your allies hit that foe, they draw strength from its weakness.
Stirring Shout.effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever an ally hits the target, that ally regains hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.

Inspire Competence.name: Inspire Competence
Inspire Competence.flavor: Your magic channels the skill of ancient experts to help with the task at hand.
Inspire Competence.target: You and each ally in the burst
Inspire Competence.effect: Choose a skill. Until the end of the encounter, each target gains a +2 power bonus to his or her next check using that skill.

Cunning Ferocity.name: Cunning Ferocity
Cunning Ferocity.flavor: The mark of your weapon on your target’s hide gives strength to your allies’ attacks against the same foe.
Cunning Ferocity.onHit: 1[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and each ally within 5 squares of you gains a +2 bonus to damage rolls against the target until the end of your next turn.
Cunning Ferocity.virtueOfCunning: The bonus to damage rolls equals 1 + your Intelligence modifier.

Dissonant Strain.name: Dissonant Strain
Dissonant Strain.flavor: You sing in two pitches at once, creating a song that harms your foe while helping your ally.
Dissonant Strain.onHit: 2d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn. In addition, an ally within 5 squares of you can make a saving throw.

Impelling Force.name: Impelling Force
Impelling Force.flavor: A bolt of force shoves your foe next to one of your allies.
Impelling Force.onHit: 1d10 + Charisma modifier force damage, and you slide the target 5 squares to a space adjacent to one of your allies.

Song of Discord.name: Song of Discord
Song of Discord.flavor: You foster distrust in one of your foes, causing it to strike out at its allies.
Song of Discord.onHit: The target is dominated until the end of your next turn.
Song of Discord.effect: The target makes a basic attack against an enemy of your choice as a free action.

Tune of Ice and Wind.name: Tune of Ice and Wind
Tune of Ice and Wind.flavor: You hum a discordant tune, slowing your enemies with ice and moving your allies with wind.
Tune of Ice and Wind.onHit: 2d6 + Charisma modifier cold damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).
Tune of Ice and Wind.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
Tune of Ice and Wind.effect: You slide each ally in the burst 3 squares.

Word of Mystic Warding.name: Word of Mystic Warding
Word of Mystic Warding.flavor: A word of power assaults your foe’s mind, establishing a ward that harms it further if it draws closer to the ally you name.
Word of Mystic Warding.onHit: 3[W] + Charisma modifier psychic damage. Choose an ally within 5 squares of you. If the target moves closer to that ally during the target’s turn, the target takes psychic damage equal to your Charisma modifier (save ends).

Distracting Shout.name: Distracting Shout
Distracting Shout.flavor: Your shout draws the enemy’s attention so that your allies can maneuver around the foe, letting them get in close or get away.
Distracting Shout.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier thunder damage, and the target takes a -5 penalty to opportunity attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
Distracting Shout.virtueOfCunning: The penalty to opportunity attack rolls equals 4 + your Intelligence modifier.

Scorpion's Claw Strike.name: Scorpion's Claw Strike
Scorpion's Claw Strike.flavor: Your distraction allows one of your allies to slip around a foe.
Scorpion's Claw Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and you slide an ally who is adjacent to the target to another space adjacent to it.
Scorpion's Claw Strike.virtueOfValor: Until the end of your next turn, the ally also gains a power bonus to AC equal to your Constitution modifier.

Forceful Conduit.name: Forceful Conduit
Forceful Conduit.flavor: A jolt of pain establishes an arcane link between your foe and one of your allies. Your ally can see through the foe’s eyes and channel his or her own powers through its body.
Forceful Conduit.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target is affected by a forceful conduit (save ends). Choose an ally within 10 squares of you. While the target is affected by this forceful conduit, that ally can make implement attacks during his or her turn as if occupying the target’s space.
Forceful Conduit.onMiss: Half damage. Until the end of your next turn, an ally within 10 squares of you can make implement attacks during his or her turn as if occupying the target’s space.

Hideous Laughter.name: Hideous Laughter
Hideous Laughter.flavor: Horrible convulsions seize your foe in a terrible mockery of laughter.
Hideous Laughter.onHit: 3d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target can’t take opportunity actions and takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends both).
Hideous Laughter.aftereffect: The target can’t take opportunity actions (save ends).
Hideous Laughter.onMiss: Half damage, and the target can’t take opportunity actions until the end of your next turn.

Thunder Blade.name: Thunder Blade
Thunder Blade.flavor: Your weapon resonates with thunder, smiting your foe and enabling you to move enemies into locations where your allies can more easily reach them.
Thunder Blade.onHit: 3[W] + Charisma modifier thunder damage, and you slide the target 2 squares.
Thunder Blade.effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever you hit a target with an at-will attack power, you slide the target 2 squares to a space that must be adjacent to at least one of your allies.

Word of Life.name: Word of Life
Word of Life.flavor: A single word is sufficient to save an ally from death’s grasp while punishing the foe who dealt the deadly blow.
Word of Life.trigger: An enemy attack reduces an ally within 20 squares of you to 0 hit points or fewer
Word of Life.target: The triggering ally in the burst
Word of Life.effect: The target can spend a healing surge. In addition, the attacking enemy takes a -5 penalty to all defenses until the end of your next turn.

Earthquake Strike.name: Earthquake Strike
Earthquake Strike.flavor: The rhythm of your attack makes the earth quake beneath your and your allies’ targets.
Earthquake Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and you knock the target prone. Until the end of your next turn, each ally within 10 squares of you can knock prone any creature he or she hits.
Earthquake Strike.virtueOfValor: Until the end of your next turn, the allies gain a bonus to damage rolls equal to your Constitution modifier.

Harmony of the Two.name: Harmony of the Two
Harmony of the Two.flavor: As you strike your foe, a nearby ally lashes out with an attack in harmony with yours.
Harmony of the Two.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage. An ally within 2 squares of you can make a basic attack against the target as a free action.

Dance of Biting Wind.name: Dance of Biting Wind
Dance of Biting Wind.flavor: Your attack impedes your foe’s attacks. Its echoes carry you and your allies in a combat dance, letting you move away from clumsy attackers.
Dance of Biting Wind.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).
Dance of Biting Wind.effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever an enemy’s attack misses you or an ally within 5 squares of you, the target of the attack can shift 1 square as a free action.

Menacing Thunder.name: Menacing Thunder
Menacing Thunder.flavor: The echoes of your blow resound as the fight continues, guiding the attacks of your allies to bring your foes to a quick end.
Menacing Thunder.effect: The burst creates a zone of resonating thunder that lasts until the end of the encounter. While within the zone, any ally gains a +2 power bonus to attack rolls.

Quick Steel Dance.name: Quick Steel Dance
Quick Steel Dance.flavor: You land a mighty blow that befuddles your foe, redirecting its attention to an ally near you. The echoes of that strike quicken your allies, allowing them to react to a foe’s movement.
Quick Steel Dance.onHit: 3[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and until the end of your next turn, the target is marked by an ally within 10 squares of you.
Quick Steel Dance.effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever an enemy that is adjacent to any of your allies shifts, those allies can each shift 1 square as an opportunity action.

Shout of Evasion.name: Shout of Evasion
Shout of Evasion.flavor: Your shout batters your foe with arcane thunder and spurs you and your allies into motion.
Shout of Evasion.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier thunder damage, and you and each ally within 10 squares of you can shift 2 squares as a free action.
Shout of Evasion.virtueOfCunning: The number of squares you and your allies can shift equals 1 + your Intelligence modifier.

Song of Summons.name: Song of Summons
Song of Summons.flavor: As you strike your foe with your weapon, you call an ally to lend aid to your attack.
Song of Summons.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and you teleport an ally within 10 squares of you to a space adjacent to you.
Song of Summons.virtueOfValor: Until the end of your next turn, the ally also gains a power bonus to attack rolls against the target equal to your Constitution modifier.

Word of Vulnerability.name: Word of Vulnerability
Word of Vulnerability.flavor: You speak a word of power as you strike your foe, and the foe becomes vulnerable to your allies’ attacks.
Word of Vulnerability.onHit: 3[W] + Charisma modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, each ally who hits the target and has combat advantage against it deals extra damage equal to your Charisma modifier.

Encircling Dance.name: Encircling Dance
Encircling Dance.flavor: As dazzling light bursts around your foes, you and your allies can move to better positions.
Encircling Dance.effect: You and each ally within 10 squares of you can shift 5 squares as a free action.

Irresistible Dance.name: Irresistible Dance
Irresistible Dance.flavor: An eerie piping fills an area, forcing the creatures there into an idiot dance that sends them careening around at your command.
Irresistible Dance.onHit: 3d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target grants combat advantage to you and  your allies (save ends).
Irresistible Dance.effect: You slide each target a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier.

Echoes in Time.name: Echoes in Time
Echoes in Time.flavor: As arcane force tears into your foe, the force rends the fabric of time. For a moment, your allies can move about and attack before teleporting back to the place they now stand.
Echoes in Time.onHit: 3d8 + Charisma modifier force damage. Each ally within 10 squares of you, as the last action of his or her next turn, can teleport as a free action back to the space where he or she started that turn.
Echoes in Time.virtueOfCunning: Until the start of your next turn, any ally who teleports using this power gains a power bonus to all defenses equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Song of Liberation.name: Song of Liberation
Song of Liberation.flavor: A burst of arcane music erupts from your weapon and washes over your allies, loosing them from bonds that restrain their movement.
Song of Liberation.onHit: 4[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and the immobilized, restrained, and slowed conditions end on each ally within 5 squares of you, provided a save can end the condition.

Frenzied Rhythm.name: Frenzied Rhythm
Frenzied Rhythm.flavor: The wild rhythm of your chant drives your enemies into senseless violence upon each other.
Frenzied Rhythm.onHit: You slide the target 5 squares. The target makes a basic attack as a free action against a creature of your choice. The target is then stunned until the end of your next turn.
Frenzied Rhythm.onMiss: The target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Bond of Malediction.name: Bond of Malediction
Bond of Malediction.flavor: You intone a dread curse upon your foe, linking its fate to the safety of your ally. If your friend is hurt, your foe will be hurt as well.
Bond of Malediction.onHit: 3d10 + Charisma modifier psychic damage. Choose an ally within 10 squares of you. Until the end of your next turn, the target takes 10 psychic damage whenever that ally takes damage.
Bond of Malediction.virtueOfCunning: Whenever the ally takes damage, the target takes psychic damage equal to 10 + your Intelligence modifier.

Crescendo of Victory.name: Crescendo of Victory
Crescendo of Victory.flavor: Your attack is the beginning of your foe’s destruction.
Crescendo of Victory.onHit: 3[W] + Charisma modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, you and your allies gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls against the target.

Kaleidoscopic Burst.name: Kaleidoscopic Burst
Kaleidoscopic Burst.flavor: You sculpt prismatic colors that dazzle your enemies and allow allies to escape.
Kaleidoscopic Burst.effect: Each ally in the burst can shift 2 squares as a free action.

Surge of Valor.name: Surge of Valor
Surge of Valor.flavor: Inspired and empowered by the example of your fierce blow, your allies surge forward to attack.
Surge of Valor.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and each ally within 10 squares of you can shift 2 squares and make a melee basic attack as a free action.
Surge of Valor.virtueOfValor: The allies gain a bonus to the attack roll and the damage roll equal to 1 + your Constitution modifier.

Hero's Beacon.name: Hero's Beacon
Hero's Beacon.flavor: Your weapon erupts in blazing light that ignites your foe in radiant flames. The light of those flames persists, healing your allies and searing your enemies.
Hero's Beacon.effect: The attack creates a zone of bright light in a burst 2 centered on the target. The zone lasts until the end of the encounter. When the target moves, the zone moves with it, remaining centered on it. Any ally who starts his or her turn within the zone regains hit points equal to your Charisma modifier. Any enemy that starts its turn within the zone takes 10 radiant damage.

Focused Sound.name: Focused Sound
Focused Sound.flavor: With a resounding shout, you rattle your enemy and expose a vulnerable spot in its defenses.
Focused Sound.onHit: 1d10 + Charisma modifier thunder damage. Until the end of your next turn, any attack against the target can score a critical hit on a roll of 18–20.

Echoing Roar.name: Echoing Roar
Echoing Roar.flavor: Your resounding song hammers your foe, dogging its steps and making escape impossible.
Echoing Roar.effect: The target is affected by an echoing roar (save ends). While affected by the echoing roar, the target takes ongoing 5 thunder damage and cannot become hidden or benefit from concealment or cover (except for total concealment or superior cover).

Saga of Rivalry.name: Saga of Rivalry
Saga of Rivalry.flavor: As you launch an arrow, you recite a tale of hatred and challenge, inciting one of your allies to fight that foe to the end.
Saga of Rivalry.effect: Choose an ally within 10 squares of you. The target takes 5 damage at the end of its turn if it is not adjacent to that ally (save ends). The ally gains a +2 power bonus to attack rolls against the target until the end of the encounter.

Cruel Fate.name: Cruel Fate
Cruel Fate.flavor: Fate has nothing kind in store for your enemies.
Cruel Fate.onHit: 1[W] + Charisma modifier damage. The next time the target is hit by an attack before the end of your next turn, the attacker rerolls the attack’s damage and uses the higher result.

Recitation of Foreknowledge.name: Recitation of Foreknowledge
Recitation of Foreknowledge.flavor: You recount the tale of a great trickster-warrior, whose uncanny awareness flusters opponents and inspires allies.
Recitation of Foreknowledge.onHit: 1d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target grants combat advantage to one ally within 10 squares of you.
Recitation of Foreknowledge.effect: One ally within 10 squares of you gains a +4 bonus to AC against opportunity attacks until the end of your next turn.
Recitation of Foreknowledge.virtueOfPrescience: The ally’s bonus to AC against opportunity attacks equals 3 + your Wisdom modifier.

Rhyme of the Blood-Seeking Blade.name: Rhyme of the Blood-Seeking Blade
Rhyme of the Blood-Seeking Blade.flavor: You swiftly loose a shot while chanting of sundered metal, and your foe’s armor no longer withstands your friend’s strike.
Rhyme of the Blood-Seeking Blade.trigger: An ally misses with a melee attack
Rhyme of the Blood-Seeking Blade.target: The target of the triggering ally’s attack
Rhyme of the Blood-Seeking Blade.onHit: 1[W] + Charisma modifier damage. The target takes a -4 penalty to all defenses against the triggering ally’s attack.
Rhyme of the Blood-Seeking Blade.virtueOfPrescience: The target’s penalty to all defenses equals 3 + your Wisdom modifier.

Song of the New Dawn.name: Song of the New Dawn
Song of the New Dawn.flavor: You call upon the sun’s light to sear your foe and shine hope on your allies.
Song of the New Dawn.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier radiant damage. Each ally adjacent to the target makes a saving throw, rolling twice and using the higher result.

Arrow of Ill Omen.name: Arrow of Ill Omen
Arrow of Ill Omen.flavor: The arrow you fire is a harbinger of your foe’s doom. Where it strikes, death follows.
Arrow of Ill Omen.effect: Choose an ally within 10 squares of you. Until the end of the encounter, when that ally hits the target but does not score a critical hit, you roll a d20. If you roll a 15 or higher, that attack becomes a critical hit, and this effect ends.

Rhyme of Fire.name: Rhyme of Fire
Rhyme of Fire.flavor: You whisper of the unquenchable fire that burns at the heart of the world, causing flames to erupt deep within your enemy.
Rhyme of Fire.effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever an ally hits the target, the target takes fire damage equal to your Charisma modifier.

Vigorous Cadence.name: Vigorous Cadence
Vigorous Cadence.flavor: Your chant inspires health and valor. With each of your enemy’s attacks, an ally’s wounds are mended.
Vigorous Cadence.effect: Until the end of the encounter, the first time the target makes an attack roll during each of its turns, your ally nearest to it regains hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.

Assured Recovery.name: Assured Recovery
Assured Recovery.flavor: You give an ally a second chance to shake off an affliction.
Assured Recovery.trigger: An ally fails a saving throw
Assured Recovery.effect: The target rerolls the saving throw with a bonus equal to your Charisma modifier.

Chord of Resilience.name: Chord of Resilience
Chord of Resilience.flavor: With notes of steel and stone, you preserve your ally from harm.
Chord of Resilience.effect: The damage the target takes is reduced by an amount equal to 5 + your Charisma modifier.

Dramatic Shift.name: Dramatic Shift
Dramatic Shift.flavor: You recite your allies’ glorious tale, helping to set them in position for triumph.
Dramatic Shift.target: You and each ally in the burst
Dramatic Shift.effect: Until the end of your next turn, each target can shift as a minor action.

Song of Speed.name: Song of Speed
Song of Speed.flavor: With a rousing refrain, you imbue an ally or yourself with superior speed and agility.
Song of Speed.effect: Until the end of your next turn, the target gains a +4 power bonus to speed and can shift 1 extra square whenever he or she shifts.

Hole in the Mind.name: Hole in the Mind
Hole in the Mind.flavor: Your maddening chant sears your enemy’s thoughts, blinding it to your ally’s threat.
Hole in the Mind.onHit: 3d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and one ally within 10 squares of you becomes invisible to the target (save ends).
Hole in the Mind.onMiss: Half damage. One ally within 10 squares of you becomes invisible to the target until the end of your next turn.

Rain of Starlight.name: Rain of Starlight
Rain of Starlight.flavor: You address an ode to the stars, calling their brilliance to shower down upon your foes.
Rain of Starlight.effect: The target is affected by showering sparks (save ends). While affected by showering sparks, the target grants combat advantage. In addition, it gains no benefit from concealment, total concealment, or invisibility.

Saga of Vengeance.name: Saga of Vengeance
Saga of Vengeance.flavor: You punctuate a tale of bloody vengeance with your shot, each word inspiring your allies.
Saga of Vengeance.effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever an ally hits the target with an attack, that ally can choose to roll a saving throw or to regain hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.

Chant of Accuracy.name: Chant of Accuracy
Chant of Accuracy.flavor: You recite the legend of the arrow that found the single gap in a foe’s armor, inspiring your companions to strike true.
Chant of Accuracy.target: You and each ally in the burst
Chant of Accuracy.effect: Each target gains a +2 power bonus to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Mantle of Unity.name: Mantle of Unity
Mantle of Unity.flavor: A swelling chorus of confidence enfolds your allies, so that the strengths of each mask another’s weakness.
Mantle of Unity.target: You and each ally in the burst
Mantle of Unity.effect: Determine the highest AC, Fortitude, Reflex, and Will among all the targets, not including any temporary bonuses or penalties. Until the end of your next turn, use these values for the corresponding defenses of all the targets.

Sharp Retort.name: Sharp Retort
Sharp Retort.flavor: Your quick rejoinder speaks of enduring pain and misfortune, hindering your enemy’s attempt to throw off a harmful effect.
Sharp Retort.trigger: An enemy rolls a saving throw
Sharp Retort.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to the saving throw.
Sharp Retort.virtueOfPrescience: The target’s penalty to the saving throw equals 1 + your Wisdom modifier.

Counterpoint.name: Counterpoint
Counterpoint.flavor: Your song mimics the beat of your foe’s attacks, so that your allies match them strike for strike.
Counterpoint.effect: Whenever the target misses with an attack, it provokes opportunity attacks from you and your allies (save ends).

Fated Vulnerability.name: Fated Vulnerability
Fated Vulnerability.flavor: Your foe cannot escape the terrible doom you dictate for it.
Fated Vulnerability.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage. Choose acid, cold, fire, force, lightning, or thunder. The target grants combat advantage and gains vulnerable 10 to attacks that have the chosen keyword (save ends both).
Fated Vulnerability.onMiss: Half damage. Choose acid, cold, fire, force, lightning, or thunder. Until the end of your next turn, the target grants combat advantage and gains vulnerable 10 to attacks that have the chosen keyword.

Satire of Evasion.name: Satire of Evasion
Satire of Evasion.flavor: Your piercing wit mocks your enemy’s defensive maneuvers and renders it more easily hit.
Satire of Evasion.onHit: 2d6 + Charisma modifier damage, and the target is affected by your satire of evasion (save ends). While the target is affected by the satire, whenever an ally misses it with an attack, you can roll a d20 and replace the ally’s die roll with yours.
Satire of Evasion.onMiss: Half damage. Until the end of your next turn, whenever an ally misses the target with an attack, you can roll a d20 and replace the ally’s die roll with yours.

Chorus of Vitality.name: Chorus of Vitality
Chorus of Vitality.flavor: With a soaring oration to victory and perseverance, you lift your allies’ spirits and dispel the pain of their wounds.
Chorus of Vitality.target: You and each ally in the burst
Chorus of Vitality.effect: Each target can spend a healing surge. Also, each target can shift 2 squares as a free action.

Resounding War Cry.name: Resounding War Cry
Resounding War Cry.flavor: Your war cry echoes among your foes, knocking them off balance and leaving them open to your allies’ attacks.
Resounding War Cry.onHit: 2d6 + Charisma modifier thunder damage. If an ally hits the target with an attack before the end of your next turn, the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Corralling Song.name: Corralling Song
Corralling Song.flavor: Beguiling words entice your foes to cluster together, exposing them to devastating area attacks.
Corralling Song.onHit: 2d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage. If the target is not adjacent to an enemy, you can slide the target 3 squares to a space that must be adjacent to an enemy.
Corralling Song.onMiss: Half damage. If the target is not adjacent to an enemy, you can slide it 1 square to a space that must be adjacent to an enemy.
Corralling Song.effect: Each target that is adjacent to an enemy after this attack is resolved takes 10 psychic damage at the end of its turn if it is not adjacent to an enemy at that time (save ends).

Mocking Epigram.name: Mocking Epigram
Mocking Epigram.flavor: Your vicious lampoon enrages your foe, causing it to swing blindly and harm its allies.
Mocking Epigram.onHit: 3d8 + Charisma modifier damage, and the target is affected by your mocking epigram (save ends). While affected by the mocking epigram, the target is weakened, and whenever it hits an ally with an attack, that attack also hits one enemy of your choice within range of that attack, including the target itself. The target cannot hit a given enemy more than once with a single attack.
Mocking Epigram.onMiss: Half damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target is weakened, and whenever it hits an ally with an attack, that attack also hits one enemy of your choice within range of that attack, including the target itself. The target cannot hit a given enemy more than once with a single attack.

Saga of the Harrying Foe.name: Saga of the Harrying Foe
Saga of the Harrying Foe.flavor: You declaim a tale of glorious single combat, compelling your enemy to seek out and do battle with your ally.
Saga of the Harrying Foe.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and you slide the target 5 squares to a space that must be adjacent to an ally. That ally gains a +2 power bonus to attack rolls against the target until the end of the encounter. In addition, the target takes 10 psychic damage at the end of its turn if it is not adjacent to that ally (save ends).
Saga of the Harrying Foe.onMiss: Half damage, and you slide the target 5 squares to a space that must be adjacent to an ally. That ally gains a +1 power bonus to attack rolls against the target until the end of the encounter. In addition, the target takes 5 psychic damage at the end of its turn if it is not adjacent to that ally (save ends).

Note of Aggression.name: Note of Aggression
Note of Aggression.flavor: A shouted verse of battle rage spurs an unexpected attack.
Note of Aggression.target: You or one ally in the burst
Note of Aggression.effect: The target can charge or make a melee basic attack as a free action.

Climactic Chord.name: Climactic Chord
Climactic Chord.flavor: You call on the fighting spirit of your allies, compelling them to strike as one.
Climactic Chord.effect: Each target can make a basic attack or use an atwill attack power as a free action, with a power bonus to the attack roll and the damage roll equal to your Charisma modifier.

Reverberating Shot.name: Reverberating Shot
Reverberating Shot.flavor: Your bow shot echoes with the power of legendary heroes, assailing your foe and fortifying your allies.
Reverberating Shot.onHit: 3[W] + Charisma modifier thunder damage. Each ally within 5 squares of the target chooses to gain a +2 power bonus either to AC or to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
Reverberating Shot.virtueOfPrescience: The power bonus equals 1 + your Wisdom modifier.

Pounding Rhythm.name: Pounding Rhythm
Pounding Rhythm.flavor: Your allies’ attacks fall like drumbeats, pummeling your foes.
Pounding Rhythm.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier thunder damage. If an ally hits the target before the end of your next turn, the target is stunned until the end of its next turn.

Strike from Legend.name: Strike from Legend
Strike from Legend.flavor: You embody a hero of old, smiting your foe with savage fury and filling your allies with renewed hope.
Strike from Legend.onHit:
4[W] + Charisma modifier damage. If the target is reduced to 0 hit points or fewer by this attack, each ally within 5 squares of the target gains a +2 power bonus to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
If the target is not reduced to 0 hit points or fewer by this attack, each ally within 5 squares of the target can spend a healing surge; add your Constitution modifier to the hit points regained by each ally.

Saga of Foretold Doom.name: Saga of Foretold Doom
Saga of Foretold Doom.flavor: An ancient cycle’s prophesied victory resembles this one more and more.
Saga of Foretold Doom.effect: If the target is hit by an attack from an ally, it is weakened until the end of the target’s next turn (save ends).

Thunder's Calling.name: Thunder's Calling
Thunder's Calling.flavor: You chant a verse of storm and thunder, sending your foe tumbling and leaving it open for a deadly shot.
Thunder's Calling.onHit: 1d8 + Charisma modifier thunder damage, and you slide the target a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier. If no creatures are adjacent to the target at the end of this movement, choose an ally within 10 squares of you to make a ranged basic attack against the target as a free action.

Moment of Escape.name: Moment of Escape
Moment of Escape.flavor: You distract your enemies with a quick refrain, giving your embattled ally a chance to get away.

Inescapable Fate.name: Inescapable Fate
Inescapable Fate.flavor: Like a well-rehearsed troupe, your allies circle around your foe as you strike.
Inescapable Fate.onHit: 3[W] + Charisma modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, when the target is hit by an attack, the attacker rerolls the attack’s damage roll and uses the higher result.

Second Chances.name: Second Chances
Second Chances.flavor: It’s good to have second chances when your life is on the line.
Second Chances.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage. Each ally within 3 squares of the target can reroll one attack roll before the start of your next turn.

Funeral Dirge.name: Funeral Dirge
Funeral Dirge.flavor: Death itself sings a wordless dirge and calls your foes to their doom.
Funeral Dirge.effect: The burst creates a zone of deep and haunting chanting that lasts until the end of the encounter. An enemy that starts it turn in the zone is weakened until the start of its next turn.

Song of the Soul Harvest.name: Song of the Soul Harvest
Song of the Soul Harvest.flavor: Your words conjure up fear of your allies, warning your enemies that the end is nigh.
Song of the Soul Harvest.effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever the target ally reduces a target to 0 hit points or fewer, that ally may immediately mark all enemies within 2 squares of it. This mark lasts until the end of the ally’s next turn.

All Soul's Ball.name: All Soul's Ball
All Soul's Ball.flavor: A haunting tune fills the air, drawing the souls of the dying to dance among their killers.
All Soul's Ball.onHit: 3d8 + Charisma modifier necrotic damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of its next turn.
All Soul's Ball.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of the encounter. When an enemy within the zone is reduced to 0 hit points or fewer, allies adjacent to the enemy may immediately spend a healing surge as a free action, and enemies adjacent to the dying enemy grant combat advantage until the end of their next turn.

Song of the Deadly Dancer.name: Song of the Deadly Dancer
Song of the Deadly Dancer.flavor: Your song calls forth a dancing amalgam of shadow, blades, and death. It whirls into being and spins toward your foes, its nightmarish gamboling keeping pace with your feverish beat.
Song of the Deadly Dancer.effect: You summon a Medium deadly dancer in an unoccupied square within range. The dancer has speed 8. It has a +4 bonus to AC and a +4 bonus to Reflex. You can give the deadly dancer the following special commands.
Song of the Deadly Dancer.standardAction: Close burst 1; targets each adjacent enemy; Charisma vs. AC; 2d10 + Charisma modifier necrotic damage, and the target is marked by the deadly dancer until the end of your next turn. After all attacks are resolved, the deadly dancer can shift 2 squares.
Song of the Deadly Dancer.opportunityAttack: Targets one creature; Charisma vs. AC; 2d10 + Charisma modifier necrotic damage.

Cutting Words.name: Cutting Words
Cutting Words.flavor: With the aid of your magic, your words become a weapon capable of luring a foe into a tactical blunder.
Cutting Words.onHit:
1d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and you pull the target 2 squares.
Increase damage to 2d8 + Charisma modifier at 21st level.

Burdening Dirge.name: Burdening Dirge
Burdening Dirge.flavor: Your dire lament is a heavy weight on your foe’s mind, binding that enemy when your allies cause it pain.
Burdening Dirge.effect: Until the end of the encounter, when an ally attacks the target and hits, the target is slowed until the end of its next turn.

Staggering Note.name: Staggering Note
Staggering Note.flavor: The sharp sound you create causes your opponent to recoil clumsily.
Staggering Note.onHit: Charisma modifier thunder damage, and you push the target 2 squares. As a free action, an ally of your choice can make a melee basic attack against the target before, after, or during this forced movement.

Disorienting Ditty.name: Disorienting Ditty
Disorienting Ditty.flavor: You shake your enemy’s senses with a shocking verse, causing the foe to move erratically.
Disorienting Ditty.onHit: 1d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and choose a square adjacent to the target. If the target does not enter that square before the end of its next turn, it takes psychic damage equal to your Charisma modifier.

Sprightly Rhythm.name: Sprightly Rhythm
Sprightly Rhythm.flavor: With precision timing, you tap out a beat that forces enemies away and allows allies to reorient themselves.
Sprightly Rhythm.onHit: 1d10 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier.
Sprightly Rhythm.onMiss: Half damage, and you push the target 1 square.
Sprightly Rhythm.effect: Each ally in the burst can shift 1 square as a free action.

Perfect Pitch.name: Perfect Pitch
Perfect Pitch.flavor: With elegant poise, you focus your arcane power to aid attacks and healing.
Perfect Pitch.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain a +2 power bonus to damage rolls with your bard attack powers, and when you or an ally regains hit points from one of your bard or bard paragon path healing powers, that character regains additional hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.

Strike Up the Dance.name: Strike Up the Dance
Strike Up the Dance.flavor: Your foes dance to your tune now.
Strike Up the Dance.onHit: 2d10 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and you slide the target 5 squares at the start of its turn and it is immobilized (save ends both).
