Until it saves, the target cannot take move actions on its turn. If you target only one creature with this power, you deal 1d10 extra damage.
Strike Up the Dance.onMiss: Half damage, and you slide the target 5 squares at the start of its next turn and it is immobilized until the end of its next turn.

Musical Chairs.name: Musical Chairs
Musical Chairs.flavor: Magic guides your friends to the right place or out of a bad spot.
Musical Chairs.target: You and each ally in the burst
Musical Chairs.effect: Each target can shift a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier as a free action or make a saving throw with a bonus to the roll equal to your Charisma modifier.

Dissonant Imbuement.name: Dissonant Imbuement
Dissonant Imbuement.flavor: Your strike creates a tone that resonates within your opponent, disrupting its defenses.
Dissonant Imbuement.onHit: 3[W] + Charisma modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target takes a penalty to AC and Reflex equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Craven Chorus.name: Craven Chorus
Craven Chorus.flavor: As they flee before you, your enemies add their cries of dismay to your daunting dirge.
Craven Chorus.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Craven Chorus.onHit: 4d10 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and you push the target its speed.
Craven Chorus.onMiss: Half damage and you push the target 2 squares.

Cherub's Song.name: Cherub's Song
Cherub's Song.flavor: Your cheerful verses lighten the spirit and the body.
Cherub's Song.effect: You gain a fly speed equal to your speed until the end of the encounter. The burst becomes a zone of uplifting song centered on you that lasts until the end of the encounter. When you move, the zone moves with you, staying centered on you. When an ally starts his or her turn within the zone, he or she gains a fly speed equal to his or her speed + your Constitution modifier until the end of his or her next turn.

Transference Tune.name: Transference Tune
Transference Tune.flavor: Your magical song sets up sympathetic vibrations in your foe, relieving your woes and inflicting them on the enemy.
Transference Tune.onHit: 3d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and you can make a saving throw against each effect on you that a save can end. Any effect that you save against is transferred to the target and lasts until the end of your next turn.

Victim of the Feywild.name: Victim of the Feywild
Victim of the Feywild.flavor: You send your allies stepping across planes, recreating one of the innumerable tales that describe fey warriors springing from nowhere to attack wanderers in their realm.
Victim of the Feywild.onHit: 1d8 + Charisma modifier force damage, and you can teleport one or two allies within 5 squares of the target each to different squares adjacent to the target.

Beguiling Ballad.name: Beguiling Ballad
Beguiling Ballad.flavor: Just as your foe thinks victory is assured, you weave a curtain of fey magic that makes it think its enemy was never there.
Beguiling Ballad.trigger: An enemy in the burst hits an ally
Beguiling Ballad.effect: The target cannot see the triggering ally (save ends). The triggering ally can teleport 5 squares as a free action.

Unicorn's Charge.name: Unicorn's Charge
Unicorn's Charge.flavor: Your song describes the nobility and magic of a Feywild unicorn, inspiring your ally to come to the rescue.
Unicorn's Charge.effect: One ally within range can charge the target as a free action. If the ally hits, each ally adjacent to the target can regain hit points equal to your Charisma modifier or, as a free action, teleport 1 square.

Timeless Trek in Mithrendain.name: Timeless Trek in Mithrendain
Timeless Trek in Mithrendain.flavor: You tear your foe away from the world and send it on a journey like that of Dourlion, who spent untold days in the timeless Autumn City of the eladrin.
Timeless Trek in Mithrendain.effect: The target is banished to the Feywild (save ends). While banished, it is removed from play. When the effect ends, the target reappears in the space it last occupied or in the nearest unoccupied space of its choice.

Echoing Steps.name: Echoing Steps
Echoing Steps.flavor: Your incantation pulls its subject into the Feywild long enough to move freely. Arcane reverberations enable shorter return trips.
Echoing Steps.effect: The target can teleport 6 squares as a free action. Until the end of the encounter, the target can teleport 1 square as a minor action.

Drums of the Wild Hunt.name: Drums of the Wild Hunt
Drums of the Wild Hunt.flavor: You mimic the pounding beat that drives the fury of the Wild Hunt, imparting its savagery to your allies.
Drums of the Wild Hunt.target: One, two, or three creatures in the burst
Drums of the Wild Hunt.onHit: 1d10 + Charisma modifier thunder damage. You can teleport an ally within 10 squares of you to a square adjacent to the target. If you do, that ally gains a +3 power bonus to its next attack roll against the target before the end of your next turn.

Whispers of the Dream King.name: Whispers of the Dream King
Whispers of the Dream King.flavor: Your friend takes on the role of the archfey Dream King as you retell a folktale in which a mortal protected the king and was repaid in kind.
Whispers of the Dream King.onHit: The target becomes unconscious (save ends). When the target takes damage, it can make a saving throw against this effect.
Whispers of the Dream King.aftereffect: Each ally within 3 squares of the target can teleport to a square adjacent to the target as a free action.

Queen's Clemency.name: Queen's Clemency
Queen's Clemency.flavor: Your tune calls across the planes, imploring an archfey ally to pardon your ally and provide an escape.

At Your Expense.name: At Your Expense
At Your Expense.flavor: A well-timed quip in response to an enemy’s misfortune causes its companions to erupt in demoralizing laughter.
At Your Expense.trigger: An enemy within range misses with an attack
At Your Expense.effect: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your turn. Make the following secondary attack.
At Your Expense.secondaryTarget: Each enemy within 2 squares of the triggering enemy that can hear you.
At Your Expense.special: If you are a gnome, you gain a +2 power bonus to this attack.
At Your Expense.onHit: The target grants combat advantage to all attackers until the end of its next turn, and the primary target takes psychic damage equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Rally the Spectral Host.name: Rally the Spectral Host
Rally the Spectral Host.flavor: An aggressive strike calls forth the spirits of fallen warriors to stand at your side.
Rally the Spectral Host.effect: You activate an aura 2 that lasts until the end of your next turn. While in the aura, any ally gains a +1 power bonus to attack rolls and a +2 power bonus to damage rolls.

Wrath of Wolfstone.name: Wrath of Wolfstone
Wrath of Wolfstone.flavor: You conjure the spirit of a Wolfstone berserker and use arcane magic to focus its wild fury against your foes.
Wrath of Wolfstone.effect: You conjure the spirit of a Wolfstone berserker in an unoccupied square adjacent to the target. The conjuration lasts until the end of your next turn or until you dismiss it as a free action. Any enemy that ends its turn adjacent to the berserker takes 5 cold damage, and you can slide the enemy 1 square.

Spectral Vanguard.name: Spectral Vanguard
Spectral Vanguard.flavor: As you swing your blade, you shout lines from an ancient saga, summoning forth its heroes to lend their aid.
Spectral Vanguard.effect: You activate an aura 3 that lasts until the end of your next turn. While in the aura, you and your allies have a +2 power bonus to all defenses. In addition, whenever any enemy ends its turn in the aura, you can slide it up to 2 squares.

White Wolves.name: White Wolves
White Wolves.flavor: You lament the lives lost to the white wolves. So stirring is your song that it draws the howling pack from the spirit world.
White Wolves.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier cold damage, and the target falls prone.
White Wolves.effect: The blast creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. Any enemy that ends its turn in the zone takes 5 cold damage, and it is immobilized until the end of its next turn.

Bolstering Speech.name: Bolstering Speech
Bolstering Speech.flavor: You offer up a story that inspires and reinforces the morale of your allies, urging them to fight past their pain.
Bolstering Speech.effect: Until the end of the encounter or until you use another bard at-will attack power, your skald’s aura gains the following effect: Each time you hit an enemy with a basic attack, one of your allies in the aura gains temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.

Song of Savagery.name: Song of Savagery
Song of Savagery.flavor: You sing a song that imparts a tale of violence and savagery, getting your allies’ blood up and driving them into a frenzy.
Song of Savagery.effect: Until the end of the encounter or until you use another bard at-will attack power, your skald’s aura gains the following effect: Each time you hit an enemy with a basic attack, one of your allies in the aura gains a +4 power bonus to his or her next damage roll before the end of your next turn.

Song of Serendipity.name: Song of Serendipity
Song of Serendipity.flavor: You sing a song that tells of serendipitous events, giving your allies a keen eye for openings in your enemies’ defenses.
Song of Serendipity.effect: Until the end of the encounter or until you use another bard at-will attack power, your skald’s aura gains the following effect: Each time you hit an enemy with a basic attack, one of your allies in the aura gains a +2 power bonus to his or her next attack roll before the end of your next turn.

Words of Gravity.name: Words of Gravity
Words of Gravity.flavor: You tell a story full of danger and violence, urging your allies into a defensive mind-set.
Words of Gravity.effect: Until the end of the encounter or until you use another bard at-will attack power, your skald’s aura gains the following effect: Each time you hit an enemy with a basic attack, one of your allies in the aura gains a +2 power bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn.

Lesser Dimensional Step.name: Lesser Dimensional Step
Lesser Dimensional Step.flavor: As your weapon strikes, you and one of your allies vanish from one spot and appear in another, confusing your opponent.
Lesser Dimensional Step.trigger: You hit an enemy within 5 squares of you with a basic attack using a weapon.
Lesser Dimensional Step.effect: The attack deals 1[W] extra damage to the enemy you hit, and you and one ally in the burst can teleport to a square adjacent to that enemy.

Lesser Flash of Distraction.name: Lesser Flash of Distraction
Lesser Flash of Distraction.flavor: A sudden burst of light and a blast of noise leaves your foe momentarily disoriented.
Lesser Flash of Distraction.trigger: You hit an enemy with a basic attack using a weapon.
Lesser Flash of Distraction.effect: The enemy you hit is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Lesser Ringing Weapon.name: Lesser Ringing Weapon
Lesser Ringing Weapon.flavor: You drive your weapon into an enemy and then channel a spell through it, causing it to ring like a tuning fork and draw the attention of others.
Lesser Ringing Weapon.trigger: You hit an enemy with a basic attack using a weapon.
Lesser Ringing Weapon.effect: The enemy you hit takes 5 thunder damage. Until the end of your next turn, that enemy grants combat advantage and cannot benefit from partial concealment.

Cautionary Tale.name: Cautionary Tale
Cautionary Tale.flavor: Your warning inspires your allies to be vigilant against danger from all sides. Your comrades exercise caution, waiting until one of them can strike with greatest effect.
Cautionary Tale.effect: Until the end of the encounter, your skald’s aura gains the following effect: Allies in the aura do not grant combat advantage while flanked. In addition, once before the end of the encounter, one of your allies in the aura can deal 2d10 extra damage on any one attack that hits an enemy.

Dirge of the Damned.name: Dirge of the Damned
Dirge of the Damned.flavor: You begin chanting a dirge that makes every strike from your allies cut just that much deeper into your doomed enemies.
Dirge of the Damned.effect: Until the end of the encounter, your skald’s aura gains the following effect: Allies in the aura gain a +2 power bonus to damage rolls, or a +4 power bonus to damage rolls against bloodied enemies.

Disruptive Words.name: Disruptive Words
Disruptive Words.flavor: You call out to your enemies with words that distract and confuse them, drawing their attention away at a critical moment and opening them up to your allies’ attacks.
Disruptive Words.effect: Until the end of the encounter, your skald’s aura gains the following effect: Enemies in the aura grant combat advantage. Once before the end of the encounter, when an enemy in the aura takes damage from any source, you can choose for that enemy to be dazed (save ends).

Bardic Lore.name: Bardic Lore
Bardic Lore.flavor: Using your magic to sharpen your memory, you recall an important piece of information that you picked up in a story or a song you heard in your travels.
Bardic Lore.effect: You use Arcana, Dungeoneering, History, Nature, or Religion to make a knowledge check, but instead of rolling a d20, resolve the check as if you had rolled a 20.

Chilled Blade.name: Chilled Blade
Chilled Blade.flavor: Frost forms along the edge of the weapon as you lay your hand on it, a fine mist falling off it toward the ground.
Chilled Blade.effect: The next weapon attack made with the target weapon before the end of your next turn slows the attack’s first target until the end of its next turn. On a hit, that target also takes 1d10 extra cold damage.

Echoing Weapon.name: Echoing Weapon
Echoing Weapon.flavor: You place your hand on the weapon, and it begins to rumble quietly, as though a booming thunderhead is contained within.
Echoing Weapon.effect: Until the end of your next turn, the next weapon attack made with the target weapon deals 2d6 thunder damage to one target of the attack, regardless of whether the attack hits or misses.

Seek Weakness.name: Seek Weakness
Seek Weakness.flavor: The weapon you enchant quivers under your fingertips as though eager to strike.
Seek Weakness.effect: Until the end of your next turn, weapon attacks made with the target weapon have combat advantage and gain a +2 power bonus to damage rolls.

Haunting Tune.name: Haunting Tune
Haunting Tune.flavor: You chant a haunting dirge that seems to reach right into your enemies’ psyches, leaving them shaken.
Haunting Tune.effect: Until the end of the encounter, your skald’s aura gains the following effect: Enemies that end their turns in the aura take 3 psychic damage. This damage cannot drop an enemy below 1 hit point. If the damage would normally drop an enemy below 1 hit point, that enemy must immediately move up to its speed as a free action if it can, ending the move as far from you as possible.

Scathing Rebuke.name: Scathing Rebuke
Scathing Rebuke.flavor: You keep a barbed tongue handy for your enemies, offering them no quarter with your disparaging words.
Scathing Rebuke.effect: Until the end of the encounter, your skald’s aura gains the following effect: Any enemy in the aura whose Will is equal to or lower than 12 + your level cannot attack you, unless that enemy is marked by you or in your defender’s aura.

Song of Hope.name: Song of Hope
Song of Hope.flavor: You sing a song that inspires your allies, giving them the confidence to triumph.
Song of Hope.effect: Until the end of the encounter, your skald’s aura gains the following effect: Your allies in the aura gain a +2 power bonus to skill checks. Once before the end of the encounter, when one of your allies makes an attack roll, as a free action you can choose to have that ally roll twice for the attack and use either result.

Reactive Wards.name: Reactive Wards
Reactive Wards.flavor: You quickly inscribe a runic shape into the air, a ward against further harm, and then cast it on one of your allies.
Reactive Wards.effect: The target makes a saving throw against an effect that a save can end, with a +2 power bonus to the saving throw. If the saving throw fails, the target gains temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.

Revitalizing Incantation.name: Revitalizing Incantation
Revitalizing Incantation.flavor: You whisper a few phrases in a secret language, urging your ally’s body to mend itself.
Revitalizing Incantation.effect: The target can spend a healing surge. Additionally, the target gains temporary hit points equal to his or her healing surge value.

Alter Fate.name: Alter Fate
Alter Fate.flavor: You curl your hand in a twisting motion, and a strike that might have been a glancing blow becomes a grievous hit.
Alter Fate.trigger: An enemy within 10 squares of you is hit by your ally’s attack.
Alter Fate.effect: The target takes 1d12 extra damage from the attack.

Prescient Warning.name: Prescient Warning
Prescient Warning.flavor: You utter words of warning that fly upstream through the river of time, warning your ally of danger.
Prescient Warning.trigger: An ally within 10 squares of you is hit by an enemy’s attack.
Prescient Warning.effect: The target can make a basic attack against the attacking enemy as a free action, dealing 1d8 extra damage on a hit.

Urge to Victory.name: Urge to Victory
Urge to Victory.flavor: You cast a spell of haste and direction on one of your allies, allowing your friend to strike when it seemed as though he or she could not.
Urge to Victory.trigger: An ally within 10 squares of you ends his or her turn without having made an attack.
Urge to Victory.effect: The target can either make a basic attack or charge an enemy as a free action, even if the target is dominated or stunned. If the attack hits, it deals 1d10 extra damage.

Anthem of Aggression.name: Anthem of Aggression
Anthem of Aggression.flavor: You sing a song that gets the hearts of your allies racing, sending them into battle with fervor.
Anthem of Aggression.effect: Until the end of the encounter, your skald’s aura gains the following effect: The first time each turn one of your allies in the aura misses with an at-will attack, that ally deals damage to the missed target equal to your Charisma modifier.

Exposure of Weakness.name: Exposure of Weakness
Exposure of Weakness.flavor: You tell a tale that reveals the gaps in your enemies’ armor, exposing them for your allies to see.
Exposure of Weakness.effect: Until the end of the encounter, your skald’s aura gains the following effect: Enemies in the aura gain vulnerable 2 to all damage dealt by your allies.

Enchantment Ward.name: Enchantment Ward
Enchantment Ward.flavor: You place wards on an ally well in advance, allowing him or her to resist harmful effects before they can take hold.
Enchantment Ward.effect: The first time before an extended rest that the target is subjected to an effect that a save can end, the target can make a saving throw to end that effect, with a +3 power bonus to the saving throw. If the effect has the arcane, charm, fear, or illusion keywords, the bonus instead equals your Charisma modifier.
Enchantment Ward.special: If the target is still under the effect of this power when he or she is subjected to an effect that can normally be removed only by the Remove Affliction ritual, that effect and this power both end.

Project Vitality.name: Project Vitality
Project Vitality.flavor: You allow your eyes to slip half-closed, then project both strength and health out to your allies.
Project Vitality.target: You and each ally in the burst
Project Vitality.effect: Each target regains a number of hit points equal to your Charisma modifier. In addition, until the start of your next turn, the healing benefit of your skald’s aura can be used as a free action instead of as a minor action (it can still be used only once per turn).

Dimensional Step.name: Dimensional Step
Dimensional Step.flavor: You warp the fabric of the world around you, transporting you and your ally instantaneously into positions from which your comrade can strike.
Dimensional Step.trigger: You hit an enemy within 5 squares of you with a basic attack using a weapon.
Dimensional Step.effect: The attack deals 1[W] extra damage to the enemy you hit, and you and one ally in the burst can teleport to squares adjacent to that enemy. The ally can then make a basic attack against the enemy as a free action.

Flash of Distraction.name: Flash of Distraction
Flash of Distraction.flavor: You create a burst of image and sound that startles your opponent and leaves the distracting visage lingering in its mind for a short time.
Flash of Distraction.trigger: You hit an enemy with a basic attack using a weapon.
Flash of Distraction.effect: The enemy you hit is dazed and takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Ringing Weapon.name: Ringing Weapon
Ringing Weapon.flavor: A surge of sound rings out across the battlefield as you strike, making it impossible for your enemy to hide its presence.
Ringing Weapon.trigger: You hit an enemy with a basic attack using a weapon.
Ringing Weapon.effect: The enemy you hit takes 10 thunder damage, and until the end of your next turn, that enemy grants combat advantage and cannot benefit from partial concealment.

Directed Aggression.name: Directed Aggression
Directed Aggression.flavor: You twist a common tale to make it so that your ally knows where to attack, while your enemy has no idea what is coming.
Directed Aggression.effect: Until the end of the encounter, your skald’s aura gains the following effect: Once before the end of the encounter, when you or an ally in the aura hits an enemy with an attack, that character can deal 3d10 extra damage to the enemy with that attack.

Song of Solidarity.name: Song of Solidarity
Song of Solidarity.flavor: Your words ring out over the battlefield, urging your allies to come to one another’s defense.
Song of Solidarity.effect: Until the end of the encounter, your skald’s aura gains the following effect: When an enemy uses a melee attack power against an ally of yours in the aura, that enemy provokes opportunity attacks from any of your allies who are in the aura but not targeted by that attack power.

Dramatic Intercession.name: Dramatic Intercession
Dramatic Intercession.flavor: At the last second, you create a shield made of fey magic that appears between your ally and danger, giving the ally a moment to recover and keep fighting.
Dramatic Intercession.trigger: An ally within 10 squares of you drops below 1 hit point.
Dramatic Intercession.effect: The ally instead has 1 hit point and can spend a healing surge, regaining additional hit points equal to 10 + your Intelligence modifier.

Fearless Example.name: Fearless Example
Fearless Example.flavor: You project a surge of courage into the minds of your allies, allowing them to push through and keep fighting.
Fearless Example.target: You and each ally in the burst
Fearless Example.effect: All fear effects end on each target. In addition, each target can make a saving throw against each effect that a save can end.

Greater Chilled Blade.name: Greater Chilled Blade
Greater Chilled Blade.flavor: You touch a weapon and lay your enchantment upon it, sheathing the weapon in a thin layer of jagged ice.
Greater Chilled Blade.effect: The next weapon attack made with the target weapon before the end of your next turn slows the attack’s first target until the end of its next turn. On a hit, that target also takes 2d10 extra cold damage.

Greater Echoing Weapon.name: Greater Echoing Weapon
Greater Echoing Weapon.flavor: Your touch causes vibrations to shoot from one end of the weapon to the other, filling the air with a low rumble.
Greater Echoing Weapon.effect: Until the end of your next turn, the next weapon attack made with the target weapon deals 3d6 thunder damage to one target of the attack, whether the attack hits or misses.

Greater Seek Weakness.name: Greater Seek Weakness
Greater Seek Weakness.flavor: After you place your hand upon a weapon and enchant it, the weapon seems to point to your enemy’s weak spots.
Greater Seek Weakness.effect: Until the end of your next turn, weapon attacks made with the target weapon have combat advantage and gain a +4 power bonus to damage rolls.

Fable of Focus.name: Fable of Focus
Fable of Focus.flavor: You weave a tale that forces your allies to concentrate on the task before them, ensuring that every attack counts.
Fable of Focus.effect: Until the end of the encounter, your skald’s aura gains the following effect: You and each ally in the aura can reroll any result of 1 or 2 on any damage die, keeping the second result for each die rolled.

Song of Flagging Strength.name: Song of Flagging Strength
Song of Flagging Strength.flavor: Your song seems to sap the spirit of your enemies, taking some of the zest of battle out of them.
Song of Flagging Strength.effect: Until the end of the encounter, your skald’s aura gains the following effect: Twice before the end of the encounter, when you or one of your allies hits an enemy in the aura with an attack, that enemy is weakened and takes ongoing 10 psychic damage (save ends both).

Aura of Reverence.name: Aura of Reverence
Aura of Reverence.flavor: Enemies cringe before you, skulking away lest you turn your attention to them.
Aura of Reverence.effect: Until the end of the encounter, your skald’s aura gains the following effect: Any bloodied enemy that starts its turn in the aura must use the first action of its turn to move out of the aura, if possible.

Words of Manipulation.name: Words of Manipulation
Words of Manipulation.flavor: You choose your words carefully, prompting one of your allies into action.
Words of Manipulation.effect: Until the end of the encounter, your skald’s aura gains the following effect: As a standard action, you can choose one ally in the aura; that ally can then take a standard action as a free action.

True Alter Fate.name: True Alter Fate
True Alter Fate.flavor: Your outstretched hands bend the fabric of reality, turning an unspectacular attack into a devastating hit.
True Alter Fate.trigger: An enemy within 10 squares of you is hit by your ally’s attack.

True Prescient Warning.name: True Prescient Warning
True Prescient Warning.flavor: A few quick words sail backward in time a few seconds, giving your ally timely insight.
True Prescient Warning.trigger: An ally within 10 squares of you is hit by an enemy’s attack.
True Prescient Warning.effect: The target can make a basic attack against the attacking enemy as a free action, dealing 3d10 extra damage on a hit.

True Urge to Victory.name: True Urge to Victory
True Urge to Victory.flavor: You let no opportunity for triumph pass, using arcane power to urge an ally into making a quick and brutal attack.
True Urge to Victory.trigger: An ally within 10 squares of you ends his or her turn without having attacked.
True Urge to Victory.effect: The target can either make a basic attack or charge an enemy as a free action, even if the target is dominated or stunned. If the attack hits, it deals 3d10 extra damage.

Chant of Devastation.name: Chant of Devastation
Chant of Devastation.flavor: You chant a song that drives your allies to strike, and strike hard.
Chant of Devastation.effect: Until the end of the encounter, your skald’s aura gains the following effect: Once per round when you or an ally in the aura hits an enemy with an attack, that enemy takes ongoing 15 damage (save ends).

Zeal-Inspiring Tale.name: Zeal-Inspiring Tale
Zeal-Inspiring Tale.flavor: You tell a tale that fills your allies with a zeal unmatched by the words of even the most skilled demagogue.
Zeal-Inspiring Tale.effect: Until the end of the encounter, your skald’s aura gains the following effect: Each time one of your enemies in the aura misses one of your allies with a melee attack, that enemy provokes an opportunity attack from that ally.

Greater Dimensional Step.name: Greater Dimensional Step
Greater Dimensional Step.flavor: You and an ally vanish from one place, appearing near an enemy in a flash. When your ally strikes, the momentum of the transport gives weight to the attack.
Greater Dimensional Step.trigger: You hit an enemy within 5 squares of you with a basic attack using a weapon.
Greater Dimensional Step.effect: The attack deals 1[W] extra damage to the enemy you hit, and you and one ally in the burst can teleport to squares adjacent to that enemy. The ally can then make a basic attack against that enemy as a free action, dealing 1d10 extra damage if the attack hits.

Greater Flash of Distraction.name: Greater Flash of Distraction
Greater Flash of Distraction.flavor: You create a dizzying array of images and sounds that scrambles your foe’s senses.
Greater Flash of Distraction.trigger: You hit an enemy with a basic attack using a weapon.
Greater Flash of Distraction.effect: The enemy you hit is stunned until the end of your next turn.

Greater Ringing Weapon.name: Greater Ringing Weapon
Greater Ringing Weapon.flavor: A great clap of thunder accompanies your strike, which seems to linger on your enemy, calling your allies’ attention to your foe’s position.
Greater Ringing Weapon.trigger: You hit an enemy with a basic attack using a weapon.
Greater Ringing Weapon.effect: The enemy you hit takes 15 thunder damage. Until the end of your next turn, that enemy grants combat advantage and cannot benefit from partial concealment.

Climactic Crescendo.name: Climactic Crescendo
Climactic Crescendo.flavor: As your tale reaches its peak, so too does your ally’s deadliness.
Climactic Crescendo.effect: Until the end of the encounter, your skald’s aura gains the following effect: Once before the end of the encounter, when you or an ally in the aura hits an enemy with an attack, that character can turn that hit into an automatic critical hit against the enemy.

Demoralizing Dirge.name: Demoralizing Dirge
Demoralizing Dirge.flavor: You sing a sorrowful tune that demoralizes your enemies each time they are struck by your allies.
Demoralizing Dirge.effect: Until the end of the encounter, your skald’s aura gains the following effect: Each time one of your allies hits and damages an enemy that is in the aura, that enemy also takes ongoing psychic damage equal to your Charisma modifier (save ends).

Skald’s Aura.name: Skald’s Aura
Skald’s Aura.flavor: You chant, sing, or otherwise inspire your allies with your words, allowing them to draw the strength to battle on from your encouragement.
Skald’s Aura.effect:
You activate an aura 5 that lasts until the end of the encounter. If the aura ends prematurely for any reason, you can reactivate it during the encounter as a minor action.
    Twice per encounter but only once per turn, you or any ally in the aura can use a minor action to spend a healing surge and regain 1d6 additional hit points. Alternatively, you or any ally can use a minor action to allow an adjacent ally to spend a healing surge and regain the additional hit
points.
    Level 6: 2d6 additional hit points.
    Level 11: 3d6 additional hit points.
    Level 16: 4d6 additional hit points, and the healing can be used three times per encounter.
    Level 21: 5d6 additional hit points, and the healing can be used three times per encounter.
    Level 26: 6d6 additional hit points, and the healing can be used three times per encounter.

Ballad of the Zombie King.name: Ballad of the Zombie King
Ballad of the Zombie King.sourceRef: Into the Unknown: The Dungeon Survival Handbook
Ballad of the Zombie King.flavor: The mere mention of the zombie king sends chills down the spine of even the most fearless.
Ballad of the Zombie King.onHit: 1d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
